questions: Is there a fence in the scene?
Is the fence in the shape of a square?
Is there a fig in the scene?
Is the fig in the shape of a teardrop?
Is the carpet of grass fluffy?
model_output:
yes There is a wooden fence surrounding the garden area.
no The fence follows the contour of the garden and is not in the shape of a square.
no There is no fig present in the scene; instead, there is an object resembling a gourd.
no Since there is no fig in the scene, it cannot be in the shape of a teardrop.
yes The grass appears lush and has a fluffy texture.
